value.stringValue: NOT(ISNEW() ) && NOT(ISCHANGED([Quote].Ship_Debit__c ) ) && NOT(ISBLANK([Quote].S_D_End_Date__c )) && ISCHANGED([Quote].S_D_End_Date__c) && [Quote].S_D_End_Date__c > TODAY() && ([Quote].CreatedBy.IsActive || NOT(ISBLANK([Quote].OwnerEmail__c) ))
AND( ISCHANGED([Quote].Status ), ISPICKVAL([Quote].Status,'Ship and Debit Approved') )

NOT(ISNEW() ) && NOT(ISCHANGED([Quote].Ship_Debit__c ) ) && NOT(ISBLANK([Quote].S_D_End_Date__c )) && ISCHANGED([Quote].S_D_End_Date__c) && [Quote].S_D_End_Date__c <= TODAY() && ( [Quote].CreatedBy.IsActive || NOT(ISBLANK([Quote].OwnerEmail__c ) ))
